name: Kunkka
title: Admiral
lore: As Admiral of the Claddish Navy, Kunkka commanded a fleet until a demon from the Cataract destroyed it all.

torrent.name: Torrent
torrent.description: Summons a rising torrent of water that stuns, lifts, and damages enemies.

tidebringer.name: Tidebringer
tidebringer.description: Kunkka's attacks cleave in a massive arc, dealing bonus damage to enemies.

xMark.name: X Marks the Spot
xMark.description: Marks a target's position. After a delay, they're returned to that spot.

ghostShip.name: Ghostship
ghostShip.description: Summons a ghostly ship that crashes into enemies, stunning and damaging them.
